import React, { Component } from 'react' import './style.css' class RegistrationForm extends Component { state = { showEmailInput: true, showPasswordInput: false, showPasswordConfirmInput: false, email: "", password: "" } handleInputChange = event => { const { name, value } = event.target; this.setState({ [name]: value }); }; handleFormSubmit = arr => { console.log(this.state) } render() { return (

) } } export default RegistrationForm
